metadata.title: CVE-2017-9044 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The print_symbol_for_build_attribute function in readelf.c in GNU Binutils2017-04-12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalidread and SEGV) via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
